titles.title: A bill to amend section 110 of title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the standard for preservation of disability evaluations for compensation purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/8/1987--Introduced. Reduces from 20 to ten years the period during which a total or permanent disability rating must be continuously in force to become irreducible for veterans' pension and insurance purposes.
